item.title: Rajpath Recalls - an android app
item.author: Author
item.description: Links  GitHub  Google Play Store  Website(Deprecated) About A native android app made I built for our college radio. The app fetches a livestream and plays it showing the current playing track/program. The user is allowed to pause and subsequently sync back to the live stream as required. The app also features a live chat with all active users, and a means to see the schedule of programs happening at any given day.
